long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GPT Cover Letter Generator is a powerful tool that utilizes AI technology to assist job seekers in crafting professional and tailored cover letters in no time. By leveraging the power of OpenAI's GPT-3.5 model, this extension simplifies the process of writing compelling cover letters to help you stand out in the job application process.

Features:

Generate Cover Letters in Seconds: Just enter the necessary details like your name, desired role, years of experience, degree, and the job description you're applying for. The AI will do the rest.

Powered by OpenAI GPT-3.5: The technology behind the extension is OpenAI's powerful GPT-3.5 model which has been trained on diverse internet text. It excels at understanding context and generating natural language responses.

Data Privacy and Security: Your data is stored locally on your device, and it is never transferred elsewhere or used for any other purpose.

How to use:

Enter your OpenAI API key.
Fill in the necessary details like your name, desired role, years of experience, degree, email, phone number, and the job description.
Click "Generate Cover Letter", and within seconds you'll have a professionally generated cover letter.
Notes:

To use the extension, you will need an OpenAI API key. This is used to interact with the OpenAI's GPT-3.5 API which powers the cover letter generation. Your API key is stored locally on your device and is not used for any other purposes.
Whether you're a seasoned professional or a fresh graduate, writing a cover letter has never been easier. Download the ChatGPT Cover Letter Generator extension today and let AI help you create impressive cover letters for your job applications.
